title: Structural, electronic and thermoelectric properties of boron phosphorous nitride B2PN via first principles study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29526-29534
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04742G, Paper

Amina, Samah Al-Qaisi, A. M. Quraishi, Akif Safeen, Shoira Formanova, Vineet Tirth, Ali Algahtani, Albandary Almahri, Noureddine Elboughdiri, Rawaa M. Mohammed, N. M. A. Hadia, Amnah Mohammed Alsuhaibani, Moamen S. Refat, Abid Zaman
A theoretical study of monolayer boron phosphorous nitride (B2PN) is performed to explore its electronic and thermoelectric properties.
